title: Monica's Apartment
description:
Brand new information: Monica Geller tem um apê no Brasil! ❤ Awesome, right? I KNOW!

Follow us: @apedamonica

Have you ever imagined staying in one of New York's most famous apartments? Be a special guest at Monica Geller, with everything right: ordering pizza delivery, a relaxing bathtub, baking a lasagna on the stove, playing a song on the guitar, watching your favorite series on TV (Friends, obviously!), a meatball sandwich, preparing and having a good coffee, listening to music CDs, laughing with friends, resting on a beautiful night's sleep...All this is now possible here in Porto Alegre, in Monica's apartment! :D

In Monica's apartment in POA, she sought to bring the most important elements of her apartment in NYC. Of course, it's very (WELL) smaller here. But it has a kitchen equipped for a chef to cook, round table for meals, living room to gather friends, Monica's room (small), Rachel's room (small), bathroom with shower and bathtub, a hidden room, and even a window from the “terrace overlooking Greenwich Village”. And, of course, purple walls (obvious), antique furniture, many paintings, artificial flowers and so many other references to the original apt.

amenities.title: Dedicated workspace
amenities.subtext: A room with wifi that’s well-suited for working.

amenities.title: Giovanna is a Superhost
amenities.subtext: Superhosts are experienced, highly rated Hosts.

reviews.text: Amazing experience!! When I entered the house, I felt really getting into the show.
The apartment corresponds to what was proposed, being in great location and with an environment identical to that of the Friends series.
Beautiful place! Congratulations to host on the idea and putting it into practice! ❤️
